## Quiz

< form id="quiz">
    <label for="question1">What is 2+2?</label><br>
    <input type="radio" id="answer1" name="question1" value="3"> 3<br>
    <input type="radio" id="answer2" name="question1" value="4"> 3<br>
    <input type="radio" id="answer3" name="question1" value="5"> 3<br>
    <br>
    <input type="button" value="Submit" onclick="checkAnswers()">
</form>

<p id="result"></p>

<script>
    function checkAnswers() {
        var correct = document.getElementById('answer2').checked;
        var resultText = correct ? "Correct!" : "Incorrect.";
        document.getElementById('result').innerText = resultText;
    }
</script>
